title: Dailies
description: A personal Android app for managing schedules, tracking daily activities, and monitoring gacha stamina. Built with offline-first SQLite storage and LLM-powered schedule parsing, supporting both PDF and ICS file formats, with Jenkins based testing and Github Actions for automated releases.

title: Undergraduate Academic Navigator
description: A UX-first degree planner with a drag-and-drop interface, real-time prerequisite checking, and immediate feedback to help students build valid course plans quickly.

title: Epic Seven Auto Shop Refresher
description: A background automation macro for Epic Seven that refreshes the in-game secret shop using ADB on emulators to streamline repetitive tasks.

title: Occasio
description: A web application for planning travel itineraries featuring an LLM-powered chatbot that gathers user context and automatically generates personalized plans. Users can invite others via email (no account required) with a dashboard for tracking RSVPs.

title: Movie Theatre Website
description: A movie booking website for browsing films, reserving seats, and receiving notifications about new releases, featuring three user roles: guest, registered users, and administrators.

title: Museum Website
description: A museum website for browsing artifacts with a dynamic search interface for fast, interactive discovery
